title: Record Level
description: The machine-actionable information profile for the collection description digital object. Linked to the RDA PID Kernel recommendation (https://www.rd-alliance.org/system/files/RDA%20Recommendation%20on%20PID%20Kernel%20Information_final.pdf)

properties.name: collectionDescriptionPID
properties.description: An unambiguous reference to the collection description record.

properties.name: hasIdentifier
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Identifier class.

properties.name: hasObjectGroup
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the ObjectGroup class.

properties.name: hasPersonRole
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the PersonRole class.

properties.name: hasReference
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the Reference class.

properties.name: hasResourceRelationship
properties.description: This property refers to one or more related instances of the ResourceRelationship class.

properties.name: isDerivedCollection
properties.description: A flag to indicate that the collection description has been generated by aggregating data from one or more underlying datasets of its individual objects.

properties.name: license
properties.description: A legal document giving official permission to do something with the resource.

properties.name: recordRights
properties.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource.

properties.name: rightsHolder
properties.description: A person or organization owning or managing rights over the resource.
